products.description: A classic, metallic body that is light-weight, adds comfort and portability. Intuitively refined Rear Key and Floating Arc Design make the sides much thinner, allowing easy one-hand control.
attributes: The finest visibility, Quad HD display

products.tagline: Premium Compact with True to Life Display
products.description: Following on the success of the LG G3, the LG G3 S is a welcome addition. With a 5.0" true to life HD IPS display and an advanced 8MP camera with Laser Auto Focus, LG G3 S combines best-in-class technology all within a sleek, compact, metallic design. Plus, powered by a long lasting 2540mAh removable battery, you can stay connected all day long.
attributes: Hassle Free Selfies with Gesture Control

products.description: Experience seamless, unwavering 4G LTE connectivity on this affordable smartphone—download, browse, and stream at lightning-fast speeds. Snap into action with a swift performance processor and powerful battery so you can stay constantly entertained throughout the day.  The F60's screen softly illuminates around the photo preview, working as a virtual flash, so you can take the perfect selfie even in low light.

Discover the LG G Flex, the shape of innovation. With a sleek and stunning vertical curved design providing a 6 inch cinematic display. This flexible handset also boasts a ‘self-healing' coating on the back cover, which gives it the ability to recover from light scratches and nicks. Performance will be impressive with the Qualcomm© Snapdragon™ 800 2.26 GHz Quad-Core processor, and a high capacity 3,500mAh Li-Polymer curved battery. Shape your experience with the LG G Flex.
attributes: 6 inch HD IPS Curved OLED Display for Cinematic Viewing
Ergonomic Curved Design with Built in Flexibility

products.description: Equipped with the latest cutting edge technology, the LG G2 is a true powerhouse smartphone that delivers greater speed in a sophisticated, slim line design. With a unique rear key button that allows you to control the phone in its most intuitive way, plus a near zero bezel and full HD IPS display that allows you to experience media better than ever before, the G2 demonstrates premium design sophistication at its very best.
attributes: Integrated, refined rear-key for intuitive usage

products.description: The LG G2 mini is a welcome addition to the LG range, boasting the good looks of the stunning G2, with near zero bezel and the innovative Rear Key. It's compact but still with an impressive 4.7 inch qHD display and features such as Knock Code™, Guest Mode™ and Quick Memo. In addition there is a Micro SD card slot and removable battery.
attributes: KnockCode, Plug and Play, Capture Plus

products.description: Optimus L7 II helps keep you in-touch and in-control. Its unique home button with LED uses colours and patterns to differentiate calls, e-mails and messages as they arrive, and its impressive battery life means you'll stay in touch for longer.  With Q Slide - so you can text while you still watch your movie - and an array of 'quick' features,  the Optimus L7 II adds up to a truly smart user experience.
attributes: Smart UX including QSlide, Quick Translate, QuickButton and Advanced QuickMemo

products.description: Get noticed with the Optimus L5 II. The textured finish of the rear design gleams brilliantly, and laser etched detail means the phone looks even slimmer than it actually is. But it's not just about good looks. The 4 inch True Colour IPS display delivers true to life colours and surprising detail, and with rounded corners and clean lines, it's a dream to hold.
attributes: 5 MP Camera with autofocus, LED flash and Geo-tagging

products.description: With rounded corners, clean lines and a shimmering, textured rear finish Optimus L3 II will turn heads. The 3.2 inch IPS screen means your pictures, videos and more will pop with true-to-life colour and surprising detail. Try out its clever features - like the voice activated shutter and Advanced QuickMemo to keep you organised while you browse.  And with a 1540mAh battery, you can keep on the move for longer.
attributes: 3.2 inch IPS True Colour LED Capacitive Touch-screen

products.description: With your favourite Google™ Apps and an amazing Photo Sphere camera, the Nexus 5 8MP OIS camera incorporates advanced technology to shoot vivid imagery with a wide range of colour and light intake. And while you're holding the camera, Optical Image Stabilization will steady the shot even with shaky hands, so your photos and videos will come out sharp and clear.
attributes: 1.3MP front facing, 8MP rear facing OIS MEMS camera
